message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you.  I understand its worth to you is significant, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.  I'm offering it to you for $1,150,000. This price allows you a considerable gain while ensuring I get a fair return on my investment.  Please consider this offer carefully. If you decline, I have another buyer ready to purchase it at a lower price.
